column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute is an encyclopedic museum and it holds many iconic works.  If you don't know where they are
column2: just follow the cell phone trail where you'll find folks taking selfies in front of their favorite Van Gogh or that famous rural couple in 'American Gothic'.  Like any great art museum
column3: this place gets packed.  If you want some alone time with your favorite paintings
column4: map out your route and get here when the doors open.
